history.proof: intros v H. induction H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v NN

Premises:
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
In_freeVarSys : forall L : Language, nat -> fol.System L -> Prop
closedNatToTerm : forall a v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (natToTerm a))
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
folLogic.existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
folReplace.reduceCloseList : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall v : nat, In v l -> ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (closeList L l f1) (closeList L l f2))
folReplace.reduceForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
folReplace.iffExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
folReplace.impForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
folReplace.reduceExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
folReplace.reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
reduceSubAll : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (map : nat -> fol.Term L) (A B : fol.Formula L), (forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L A B) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (subAllFormula L A map) (subAllFormula L B map))
freeVarClosedList1 : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (v : nat) (x : fol.Formula L), In v l -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L (closeList L l x))
folProof.FA2 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L A) -> folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.forallH L v A))
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
folProof.GEN : forall (L : Language) (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> folProof.Prf L Axm A -> folProof.Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A)
closedNN1 = fun (v : nat) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (H : mem (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9) f) => Union_ind (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Singleton...
notInFreeVarSys : forall (L : Language) (x : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L x (Empty_set (fol.Formula L))
folProof.FA3 : forall (L : Language) (A B : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v (fol.impH L A B)) (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v A) (fol.forallH L v B)))
subFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.impH L f1 f2) v s = fol.impH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
folProof.FA1 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v A) (substituteFormula L A v t))
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
folLogic.forallE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)
folLogic.existI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
subFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s) else fol.forallH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
Nat.lt_irrefl : forall x : nat, ~ x < x
Nat.nlt_0_r : forall n : nat, ~ n < 0
Nat.nlt_succ_diag_l : forall n : nat, ~ S n < n
subToSubAll : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L A v s) (subAllFormula L A (fun x : nat => if Nat.eq_dec v x then s else fol.var L x)))
Inductive Prf (L : Language) : fol.Formulas L -> fol.Formula L -> Set := AXM : forall A : fol.Formula L, folProof.Prf L (A :: nil) A | MP : forall (Axm1 Axm2 : fol.Formulas L) (A B : fol.Formula L), folProof.Prf L Axm1 (fol.impH L A B) -> folProof.Prf L Axm2 A -> folProof.Prf L (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B | GEN : forall (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> folProof.Prf L Axm A -> folProof.Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A) | IMP1 : forall A B : fol.Formula L, folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.impH L B A)) | IMP2 : forall A B C : fol.Formula L, folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L (fol.impH L A (fol.impH...
Nat.lt_nge : forall n m : nat, n < m < -> ~ m <= n
Nat.lt_asymm : forall n m : nat, n < m -> ~ m < n
Nat.nlt_ge : forall n m : nat, ~ n < m < -> m <= n
gt_not_le : forall n m : nat, n > m -> ~ n <= m
gt_asym : forall n m : nat, n > m -> ~ m > n
Nat.le_ngt : forall n m : nat, n <= m < -> ~ m < n
le_not_lt : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> ~ m < n

```coq
intros v H.
unfold not. intro.
induction H.
Qed.```
